step1.title: Welcome
step1.description: Turn your new tab into a focused task panel. Start using without login.

step2.title: Focus Mode
step2.description: A large clock with today's key tasks helps you see what matters most. Add up to 3 focus tasks.

step3.title: Quick Actions
step3.description: Click the circle on the left to complete a task. Simple and efficient.

step4.title: Themes
step4.description: Multiple themes available. Click the top right to switch. Connect TickTick to unlock more features.
